pages.text: The $(mob)Stray$() is a variant of the $(l:minecraft_skeleton)$(mob)Skeleton$() that spawns in icy biomes. Compared to normal $(l:minecraft_skeleton)$(mob)Skeletons$(), it inflicts $(thing)Slowness$() on its targets when hitting them with its $(item)Arrows$().$(p)It can also drop $(item)Arrows of Slowness$() on death.
